  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3418</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Nobel Laureates: 1967 the Nobel Prize in Physiology or medicine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nobel Laureaten: 1967 der Nobelpreis in der
Physiologie oder in der Medizin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lauréats Nobel : 1967 le prix Nobel dans 
la physiologie ou la médecine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Laureates De Nobel: 1967 o prêmio de nobel
no physiology ou na medicina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Laureates Nobel: 1967 il premio Nobel nella
fisiologia o nella medicina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δαφνοστεφές Νόμπελ: 1967 το βραβείο Νόμπελ 
στη φυσιολογία ή την ιατρική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Laureados Nobel: 1967 el premio Nobel en 
fisiología o medicina</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Information on the research done by Ragnar Granit, Haldan Keffer Hartline, George Wald which won them the Nobel Prize For their discoveries concerning the primary physiological and chemical visual processes in the eye.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">eyes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vision</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical processing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Nobel Prize</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationen über die Forschung erfolgt von 
Ragnar Granit, Haldan Keffer Hartline, George Wald, das sie der 
Nobelpreis für ihre Entdeckungen hinsichtlich sind der 
physiologischen und chemischen Sichthauptsächlichprozesse im Auge 
gewann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'information sur la recherche faite par Ragnar 
Granit, Haldan Keffer Hartline, George Wald qui les a gagnées le
prix Nobel pour leurs découvertes au sujet des processus visuels 
physiologiques et chimiques primaires dans l'oeil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Informação na pesquisa feita por Ragnar Granit,
Haldan Keffer Hartline, George Wald que os ganhou o prêmio de nobel 
para suas descobertas a respeito dos processos visuais physiological e
químicos preliminares no olho.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le informazioni sulla ricerca fatta da Ragnar 
Granit, Haldan Keffer Hartline, George Wald che le ha vinte il premio 
Nobel per le loro scoperte riguardo ai processi visivi fisiologici e 
chimici primari nell'occhio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πληροφορίες για την έρευνα που γίνεται από Ragnar 
Granit, Haldan Keffer Hartline, George Wald ωχηθχ 
τους κέρδισε το βραβείο Νόμπελ για τις ανακαλύψεις τους σχετικά 
με τις αρχικές φυσιολογικές και χημικές οπτικές διαδικασίες στο 
μάτι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Información sobre la investigación hecha por 
Ragnar Granit, Haldan Keffer Hartline, George Wald que las ganó el 
premio Nobel para sus descubrimientos referentes a los procesos 
visuales fisiológicos y químicos primarios en el ojo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Augen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anblick</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chemische Verarbeitung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nobelpreis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">yeux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vision</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">traitement chimique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Prix Nobel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">olhos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">visão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">processar químico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Prêmio De Nobel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">visione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">elaborare chimico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Premio Nobel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">όραμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χημική επεξεργασία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βραβείο Νόμπελ</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
